name: Tata Tele Services (Maharashtra) Limited
description: Tata Tele Services (Maharashtra) Limited (TTML) is a leading telecommunications service provider in India, offering a comprehensive range of telecom solutions. Part of the Tata Group, TTML has been operational since 1996 and has established a strong presence in Maharashtra and Goa. The company provides a variety of services including mobile and fixed-line telephony, broadband services, and value-added services. It is recognized for its commitment to delivering high-quality connectivity and innovative solutions to both individual and enterprise customers. TTML's mobile services include 2G, 3G, and 4G LTE networks, catering to a diverse customer base. The company is focused on enhancing customer experience through technological advancements and has invested significantly in infrastructure development. With a vision to empower customers through digital services, TTML is also working towards expanding its footprint in the rapidly growing digital services market. The company emphasizes sustainability and corporate social responsibility, aligning with the Tata Group’s overarching philosophy. TTML continues to adapt to the dynamic telecommunications landscape, striving to meet the evolving needs of its customers while contributing to the digital transformation of India.

seo.meta_title: Tata Tele Services (Maharashtra) Limited | Telecommunications Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Tata Tele Services (Maharashtra) Limited, a leading telecom provider in India, offering mobile, fixed-line, and broadband services. Discover our commitment to quality and innovation.

faq.question: What services does Tata Tele Services provide?
faq.answer: Tata Tele Services provides mobile and fixed-line telephony, broadband services, and various value-added services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tata Tele Services?
faq.answer: Rajendra Chourasia is the CEO of Tata Tele Services (Maharashtra) Limited.

faq.question: Where is Tata Tele Services headquartered?
faq.answer: Tata Tele Services is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

faq.question: When was Tata Tele Services founded?
faq.answer: Tata Tele Services was founded in 1996.
